SELECT EXPER_NO, BOOTH_NO, EXPER_TIME, EXPER_DATE, EXPER_TITLE, EXPER_DETAIL, EXPER_PRICE, CAPACITY, EXPER_IMG_ON, EXPER_IMG_FP, BOOTH_NAME FROM EXPERIENCE JOIN BOOTH USING(BOOTH_NO) JOIN COMPANY ON(USER_NO = COM_NO) WHERE USER_NO=#{userNo} AND EXPER_STATUS='Y' ORDER BY EXPER_ENROLLDATE DESC

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EXPERIENCE(EXPER_NO, BOOTH_NO, EXPER_TITLE, EXPER_DETAIL, EXPER_TIME, EXPER_DATE, EXPER_PRICE, CAPACITY, EXPER_IMG_ON, EXPER_IMG_FP) VALUES(SEQ_ENO.NEXTVAL, #{boothNo}, #{experTitle}, #{experDetail}, #{experTime}, #{experDate}, #{experPrice}, #{capacity}, #{experImgOn}, #{experImgFp})
mapper.update: UPDATE EXPERIENCE SET EXPER_TITLE=#{experTitle}, EXPER_DETAIL=#{experDetail}, EXPER_DATE=#{experDate}, EXPER_TIME=#{experTime}, CAPACITY=#{capacity}, EXPER_PRICE=#{experPrice}, EXPER_IMG_ON=#{experImgOn}, EXPER_IMG_FP=#{experImgFp} WHERE EXPER_NO=#{experNo}
